title: The Praying Mantis
description: Praying mantises are predatory insects known for their triangular head, raptorial forelegs used for catching prey, and their distinctive 'praying' posture.

questions.question: What is the primary diet of a praying mantis?
Why is the praying mantis's head triangular and flexible?
options: To see in all directions without moving
questions.correct_answer: To see in all directions without moving

questions.question: What are the specialized front legs of a praying mantis called?
How does a praying mantis catch its prey?
options: By waiting motionless and striking suddenly
questions.correct_answer: By waiting motionless and striking suddenly

questions.question: What happens to female praying mantises after mating?
options: Males leave to find new territories
